full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDE MCHOG LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SNYAN BRGYUD YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN DAM PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE LA BRTEN PA'I BDE MCHOG GI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SNYAN BRGYUD YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS RUS PHUN TSOGS PA'I DAD LDAN BLO GSAL DON GNYER CAN DGE SLONG LUNG RTOGS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, ,RANG NYID KYANG DAD MOS KYIS MTSAMS SBYAR TE, BLA MA DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS BLANGS PA'I MTHU LAS, ,CHOS 'DI'I SNYAN BRGYUD GDAMS PA BKA' DRIN DU THOB PA'I SNGAGS RAMS PA BSTAN DAR GYIS, ^AAM PAN T'A CHIN WANG GI DGON SDER SUG BRIS BGIS PA'O, CHOS 'DI GNAM DANG SA LAS 'ONGS PA MIN, ,DAG SNANG RANG SHAR GSAR BSHAD MA YIN NA'ANG, ,DAM PA GONG MAS BKA' RGYA DAM BCAD PA'I, ,GDAMS PA RNAMS LAS BTUS PAS GSANG BA GCES, ,)
